name: Ferox: Caravan Management
description:
Ferox: Caravan Management is a game about moving carts around to collect resources, getting those carts back to base, and getting lost in the ever-shifting woods of the Ferox.

You must grow your population enough to attract Seekers, special individuals chosen by Ferox itself to collect old-world technology from hidden Tech Vaults.

The "ending" is literally just a screen that says "you won!" so unless you're very dedicated, this mostly exists for prototyping the concept.

Made for the Fitchburg State Game Jam, Fall 2021.
